sourcesContent: import React from "react" import PropTypes from "prop-types" import NoImage from "../../images/no_image.jpg" import { IMAGE_BASE_URL, POSTER_SIZE } from "../../../config" import { StyledActor } from "./StyledActor" const Actor = ( {actor} ) => ( {actor.name} {actor.character} ) Actor.propTypes = { actor: PropTypes.object } export default Actor
